        Description copied from interface: IChatroom
        Add the specified chatserver to this chatroom.
        Parameters:
        chatStub - IChatServer stub to be added.
        Returns:

        Description copied from interface: IChatroom
        Remove the chatserver from this chatroom.
        Parameters:
        chatServer - IChatServer stub to remove.
        Returns:
        True if chatServer is removed from the chatroom and false if chatServer is not in chatroom.
